info.title: comdirect REST API
info.description: Please have a look at the interfaces of comdirect REST API below. Note: Currently it is not possible to request an access token via swagger UI tools because of comdirect's proprietary authorization flow. The shown error message is due to that circumstance.

get.summary: Request for account information, including cash balance and buying power, for all accounts

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Can be either the customer identification number (UUID) or 'user'

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Suppresses the master data of the accounts

get.summary: Requests and returns a list of transactions for the given account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account identifier (UUID)

parameters.name: transactionState
parameters.description: Filters for AccountTransactions. Will return all AccountTransactions (BOTH), or return all booked AccountTransactions (BOOKED), or all not booked AccountTransactions (NOTBOOKED).

parameters.name: transactionDirection
parameters.description: Filters for CREDIT, DEBIT or CREDIT_AND_DEBIT

parameters.name: paging-first
parameters.description: Index of the first transaction.

parameters.name: with-attr
parameters.description: Enforce to load the master data of an attribute. Currently supported attributes: account

get.summary: Request for account information, including cash balance and buying power

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account identifier (UUID)

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Suppresses the master data of the account

get.summary: Request for a list of the master data for the securities accounts of the registered user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: UUID of the user to search depots for, or the string 'user' to use the logged in user

get.summary: Delivers a list of all orders for the given depotId.

parameters.name: depotId
parameters.description: Reference to securities account number (as UUID).

parameters.name: with-attr
parameters.description: enables attribute: instrument.

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Disables attribute: executions.

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument id (UUID), unique identification of an instrument (security, derivative, etc.).

parameters.name: isin
parameters.description: ISIN

parameters.name: wkn
parameters.description: WKN

parameters.name: orderStatus
parameters.description: Status of the order.

parameters.name: venueId
parameters.description: Venue id (UUID), unique identification of a venue.

parameters.name: orderType
parameters.description: The order type.

parameters.name: min-creationTimeStamp
parameters.description: Minimum value of order's creation timestamp in UTC with the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss,ffffff+zz.

parameters.name: max-creationTimeStamp
parameters.description: Maximum value of order's creation timestamp in UTC with the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss,ffffff+zz.

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: Possible transaction types

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument identification - can be either the WKN, the ISIN or the symbol of the instrument

parameters.name: with-attr
parameters.description: Enables attribute: orderDimensions

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Disables attribute: staticData

get.summary: Request for securities positions, optionally including only the total balance with securities account information

parameters.name: depotId
parameters.description: Reference to securities account number (as UUID).

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument identification - can either be the WKN, the ISIN or the UUID of the instrument.

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Disables attributes for this request. Allowed attributes: depot, positions

parameters.name: with-attr
parameters.description: Enables additional attributes for this request. Allowed attributes: instrument

get.summary: Request for retrieving a single position of specific depot.

parameters.name: depotId
parameters.description: Reference to securities account number (as UUID).

parameters.name: positionId
parameters.description: Position identification number in securities account (as UUID)

parameters.name: with-attr
parameters.description: Enables additional attributes for this request. Allowed attributes: instrument

parameters.name: depotId
parameters.description: Reference to securities account number (as UUID).

parameters.name: isin
parameters.description: ISIN

parameters.name: wkn
parameters.description: WKN

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument id (UUID), unique identification of an instrument.

parameters.name: min-bookingDate
parameters.description: Earliest booking date of the transaction. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or as negative offset from the current date e.g. -10d

post.summary: Generation of the ex-ante cost indication on the basis of the order data.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The Order for which the cost indication is to be calculated

get.summary: Request for the trading venue and order options for a particular instrument

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: Instrument id (UUID), unique identification of an instrument (security, derivative, etc.).

parameters.name: isin
parameters.description: ISIN

parameters.name: wkn
parameters.description: WKN

parameters.name: custodyType
parameters.description: The custody type.

parameters.name: venueId
parameters.description: Venue id (UUID), unique identification of a venue.

parameters.name: orderType
parameters.description: The order type.

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: Possible transaction types.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country of venue in ISO 3166-2.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of venue.

post.summary: Validation of an order entry and triggering of a TAN-Challenge in a non-usage case of a Session-TAN.

get.summary: Delivers an order for the given orderId.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Unique orderId (UUID).

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Disables attribute: executions.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Reference to order identifier (as UUID).

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Reference to order identifier (as UUID).

post.summary: Generation of the ex-ante cost indication on the basis of the order data.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Reference to order identifier (as UUID).

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The Order for which the cost indication is to be calculated

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Reference to order identifier (as UUID).

post.summary: Validation of an order modification or order cancellation and triggering of a TAN Challenge in a non-usage case of a Session-TAN.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Reference to order identifier (as UUID).

post.summary: Sends a quote request to a venue

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order for which a ticket will be acquired

parameters.name: ticketId
parameters.description: Reference to the quote ticket (as UUID).

get.summary: Delivers a list of documents for the customer.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The literal "user" or the unique ID of the client.

parameters.name: paging-first
parameters.description: Index of the returning results.

parameters.name: paging-count
parameters.description: The maximum number of results that will be returned.

get.summary: Delivers a document for the given UUID.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

get.summary: Delivers a predocument for the given UUID.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the document.

get.summary: List of all balances for a client's own and connected products.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The literal "user" or the UUID of the participant.

parameters.name: clientConnectionType
parameters.description: A single ConnectionType of a client connection or a list of ConnectionTypes.

parameters.name: targetClientId
parameters.description: A single UUID of a target client or a list of UUIDs.

parameters.name: without-attr
parameters.description: Prevents setting the static data in the balance objects.

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: Filter for a single or list of product types.

get.summary: Returns the current Session-Objects for the specified client, can handle the literal "user" for the currently logged in client.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The literal "user" or the UUID of the client.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The literal "user" or the UUID of the client.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Reference to the session (UUID)

post.summary: Validates the input and checks if the client is able to update the current session. An activated session TAN cannot be deactivated in the current session. It is necessary to provide a TAN when patching the activation of the session TAN.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The literal "user" or the UUID of the client.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Reference to the session (UUID)

scopes.TWO_FACTOR: Read and write permission for SESSION interfaces

scopes.BROKERAGE_RW: Read and write permission for BROKERAGE interfaces
scopes.SESSION_RW: Read and write permission for SESSION interfaces

accountType.description: Account type. 'key' contains the product type, 'text' a description

iban.description: IBAN (International bank account number), if available

account.description: The master data of this account (attribute can be suppressed by using the parameter 'without-attr=account')

availableCashAmount.description: Sum of current account balance + credit limit - sum of funds, which are already planned but not yet booked. This is the maximum cash limit

AccountBalance.description: Account information, including cash balance and buying power

iban.description: The IBAN (International bank account number) for the account - if available

bic.description: The BIC (Bank Identifier Code) for the IBAN - if available

AccountInformation.description: Model for the information of an account (debtor/creditor).

reference.description: unique reference code of the transaction

remitter.description: Account information of name, IBAN and BIC of the remitter.

deptor.description: Account information of name, IBAN and BIC of the debtor

creditor.description: includes the account information of the name, IBAN and BIC from the creditor

valutaDate.description: Availability date (yyyy-mm-dd). Could be an invalid date e.g. 2019-12-32

directDebitCreditorId.description: Gives back the creditor identifier of an account transaction, if it is a direct debit.

directDebitMandateId.description: Gives back the mandateId of an account transaction, if it is a direct debit.

endToEndReference.description: Gives back the end-to-end-reference of an account transaction, if it is a direct debit.

newTransaction.description: Shows whether the client has seen the account transaction in web.

remittanceInfo.description: remittance information of the transaction. This can be more then one line with a length of 35 symbols. The lines will be numbered in case of an already booked transaction.

unit.description: {XXX, XXC, XXM, XXP, XXU} or currencies according to ISO-4217 (EUR, USD, GBP,...)

AmountValue.description: Represents the amount value with the currency.

fixedTermSavings.description: Balance object for a fixed term saving

installmentLoanBalance.description: Balance object for an installment loan

Balance.description: A balance object is equal to one of the types indicated by the attributes in this definition.

origin.description: List of properties causing validation errors

cardType.description: Type of the card. 'key' contains the card type, 'text' a description

clientId.description: Client connection uniquely assigned to the credit card account.

participantId.description: Contract code of the client uniquely assigned to the credit card account.

settlementAccountId.description: Default settlement account number uniquely assigned to the credit card account. In this case, it has to be the current account.

cardValidity.description: validity of the card. Format: MM/YY

primaryAccountNumberSuffix.description: Last 4 digits of the credit card number

cardLimit.description: Card limit if available. Will be 0.00 EUR if card has no limit.

availableCashAmount.description: Sum of current account balance + credit limit - sum of scheduled amounts which are not booked yet. This is the maximum cash limit.

CostEntry.description: Cost entry of a cost group.

type.description: Type of cost group. K: Costs of securities purchase, H: Costs of the holding period (per year), V: Costs of the sale of securities

label.description: Name of cost group for showing in the cost-note

sum.description: Sum of the cost group in trading currency (quantity.amount.unit)

sumReportingCurrency.description: Sum of the cost group in reporting currency

costs.description: List of costs per cost group

CostGroup.description: Model for a cost group including a list of cost entries for this cost group.

calculationSuccessful.description: Result of calculation of cost indication; if false, linkCosts will link to a generic cost indication

side.description: Type of transaction analogous to Order.side

limit.description: Limit analogous to Order.limit with trading currency

expectedValue.description: Expected value (net costs) of the order: in trading currency

venueName.description: Execution venue as name for the display

fxRate.description: Exchange rate for settlement currency to FX, for buy and sell (both sides for conversion depending on BUY/SELL)

expectedSettlementCosts.description: Expected costs for order analogue (real) settlement costs

holdingPeriod.description: Holding period in years, displayed on purchase

totalCostsAbs.description: Absolute amount of the total costs

totalCostsRel.description: Amount of total costs relative to the investment

totalCostsDetail.description: Total cost block including total cost entries segregated as: E (own service costs of bank), F (external service costs), and P (product costs)

totalHoldingCosts.description: List of cost blocks over time

linkCosts.description: HTTP link to further cost information

linkKid.description: HTTP link to key information document

CostIndicationExAnte.description: Ex-ante cost indication on the basis of the order data.

CurrencyString.description: Represents the ISO-4217 code of the currency.

DateString.description: Represents the date without the time.

DateTimeString.description: Represents the date with the time.

clientId.description: Identification code of the client uniquely assigned to the securities account

defaultSettlementAccountId.description: Default settlement account number uniquely assigned to the securities account

settlementAccountIds.description: List of other settlement account identification numbers assigned to the securities account

depot.description: The master data of this securities account (this attribute can be suppressed by using the parameter 'without-attr=depot')

dateLastUpdate.description: Date of the last update of securities holdings & master data. YYYY-MM-DD

currentValue.description: Current value of the securities account (the sum of all the securities holdings at their current prices)

purchaseValue.description: Sum of the purchase values of all the securities holdings

prevDayValue.description: Value of the securities account (the sum of all the securities holdings at the closing prices of the previous day)

lendingValue.description: Sum of the lending values of all of the securities holdings

profitLossPurchaseAbs.description: Profit/loss at the absolute purchase value

profitLossPurchaseRel.description: Profit/loss relative to purchase value in percentage

profitLossPrevDayAbs.description: Absolute profit/loss compared to the previous day

profitLossPrevDayRel.description: Profit/Loss compared to the previous day in percentage

positionId.description: Position identification number in securities account

quantity.description: Quantity or nominal amount in case of a percentage quotation

availableQuantity.description: Available quantity or nominal amount in case of a percentage quotation

prevDayPrice.description: Price of the previous day, if available

purchaseValue.description: Average purchase value of the position

prevDayValue.description: Position value at previous day's closing price

profitLossPurchaseAbs.description: Absolute profit/loss at purchase price, if available

profitLossPurchaseRel.description: Profit/loss relative to purchase value in percentage, if available

profitLossPrevDayAbs.description: Absolute profit/loss compared to previous day, if available

profitLossPrevDayRel.description: Profit/Loss compared to previous day in percentage, if available

instrument.description: Information about the instrument of the securities position
Information about the instrument of the securities position

transactionType.description: On the basis of securities account turnover transaction type

fxRate.description: Exchange rate settlement currency EUR to FX if exectionPrice amount is not notated in EUR

interestPaymentDate.description: date of the interest payment of a bond

interestPaymentInterval.description: interval of the interest payment of a bond",allowableValues = "monthly, quarterly, biannualy, annualy

name.example: Villeroy & Boch AG: Einladung zur Hauptversammlung
name.description: Name or description of the document.

dateCreation.description: Date at which the Document was assigned to the client.

mimeType.description: The native mimeType of the document.

deletable.description: Is the client allowed to delete the document?

advertisement.description: Is the document advertising comdirect products?

documentMetaData.description: Object containing optional information about the document. Available information will differ between categories.

dateRead.description: Date on which the document was read.

DocumentMetadata.description: Model for category-specific metadata of documents.

key.description: Unique key value for an enumeration type.

EnumText.description: Holds a unique key and the corresponding text.

executionNumber.description: Position (by time) of the execution of an order

executedQuantity.description: Quantity of executed units or nominal amount

executionTimestamp.description: Date/timestamp of the order entry in UTC in the following format: (MiFID II) YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss,ffffff+zz

interestRate.description: Interest rate of the deposit account.

contractPeriodInMonths.description: Contract period of the deposit account in months.

extendable.description: Indicates whether the investment can be extended.

fundFlags.description: List of different features of funds

FundDistribution.description: additional fund data, if the instrument is a fund

bid.description: Bid rate of settlement currency to FX

ask.description: Ask rate of settlement currency to FX

FXRateEUR.description: Exchange rate for settlement currency to FX.

estimated.description: TRUE, if the amount is an estimation

productDisplayId.description: SWK number of the installment loan.

creditAmount.description: Approved loan amount of the initial conclusion of the loan in EUR, including residual debt insurance and interest.

netCreditAmount.description: Approved loan amount of the initial conclusion of the loan in EUR, before residual debt insurance and interest.

paidOutAmount.description: Paid out amount of the approved loan, can include additions or deductions for residual debt insurance or interest.

installmentAmount.description: Amount of the installment loan in EUR.

contractPeriodInMonths.description: Runtime of the installment loan in months.

contractConclusionDate.description: Date of conclusion of the installment loan.

InstallmentLoan.description: Master data of an installment loan

installmentLoan.description: Master data of the installment loan.

balance.description: Current balance of the installment loan in EUR, including residual debt insurance and interest.

InstallmentLoanBalance.description: Balance and master data of an installment loan

instrumentId.description: Instrument id (UUID), unique identification of an instrument (security, derivative, etc.) for future use

mnemonic.description: Security symbol according to WM data-service

staticData.description: Static data of the instrument, e.g., notation, instrument type

orderDimensions.description: List of the trading venues including the attributes (orderDimensions)

fundsDistribution.description: additional fund data, if the instrument is a fund

settlementAccountId.description: Reference settlement account for the securities account, if different from the settlement account assigned directly to the securities account (UUID)

creationTimestamp.description: Date/timestamp of the order entry in UTC with the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss,ffffff+zz

legNumber.description: Order leg number (if ordertype is OCO or NEO)

bestEx.description: Flag if order is a best-execution-order, default value is false

orderType.description: Ordertype, partially executed and open orders are listed in the execution parameters

subOrders.description: Parts of the orders, e.g. combination orders OCO, NEO (Next Order) with different order legs or partially executed or partially cancelled orders with different parts of an order

instrumentId.description: WKN, ISIN or uuId; wkn will be returned if instrumentId is entered as wkn, an ISIN is returned if instrumentId is entered as ISIN, a uuId is returned if instrumentId is entered as uuId

quoteId.description: Quote-Id as reference for the quote received from the trading venue (issuer or exchange) on the quote request

venueId.description: UUID of the trading venue or partner. This is mandatory, if isBestEx=FALSE

quantity.description: Quantity or nominal amount in the case of a percentage quotation

tradingRestriction.description: Restrictions on trade (Opening Auction Only, Auction Only, Closing Auction Only)

limit.description: Limit of the order, empty in case of a market order, stop market, trailing stop market order or a corresponding suborder

triggerLimit.description: Trigger limit: stop limit by which a Stop order is triggered (Stop, TLS, OCO)

trailingLimitDistAbs.description: Distance trigger limit of the trailing stop order from the current absolute price

trailingLimitDistRel.description: Distance trigger limit of the trailing stop order from the current price in percentage

validityType.description: Type of order validity (Good-for-day (default), Good-til-date (incl. end of month))

validity.description: Date of order validity in format YYYY-MM-DD; required for validityType=GTD

expectedValue.description: Expected value of the limit order

executions.description: List of execution types for the order

quoteTicketId.description: Ticket UUID for the quote order. This is mandatory, if for a quote order

version.description: Version of the position to be sold. Only applicable for sell

limitExtensions.description: Names of the possible limit extensions

type.description: Type of the price. Can be one of the following: {LST, BID, ASK, MID}.

quantity.description: Quantity or nominal amount in case of a percentage quotation.

targetClientId.description: Unique Id of the target client (UUID).

balance.description: Balance object based on the product type.

instrumentId.description: WKN, ISIN or uuId; wkn will be returned if instrumentId is entered as wkn, an ISIN is returned if instrumentId is entered as ISIN, a uuId is returned if instrumentId is entered as uuId

venueId.description: UUID of the trading venue or partner. This is mandatory, if isBestEx=FALSE

quantity.description: Quantity or nominal amount in the case of a percentage quotation

sessionTanActive.description: This boolean is used to point out whether or not the current session has an active session TAN (transaction authentication number). With an active session TAN some use cases, that are genuinely TAN protected, might be callable without asking the client for a TAN. The validation method of session TAN ready use cases will return "TAN_FREE" as a TAN type while the session TAN is activated. The session TAN will be available after a refresh of tokens and dies with the last pair of tokens (access and refresh token).

activated2FA.description: Boolean indicating whether a second factor is already added to this session

notation.description: Ticker symbol or notation of a security

currency.description: instrument currency of a security, e.g., for bonds, bond and open real estate funds; additionally to ISO 4217 currency code the following values are possible: XXX (Pcs.), XXP (Pts.), XXU (Unknown)

priipsRelevant.description: Flag indicating - if TRUE - that EU-regulation referring to Packaged Retail and Insurance-based Investment Products - PRIIPs) is relevant for the instrument

kidAvailable.description: Flag indicating - if TRUE - that a Key Information Document (KID) of the issuer is electronically available. Before order placement a static note ought to displayed in such a case.

shippingWaiverRequired.description: Flag indicating - if TRUE - that within prevalidation and before placement of a buy order the investor must approve, e.g., by a frontend checkbox that no shipping of fund sales information is required (waiver); a static note regarding that information ought to be displayed in such a case. Without an explicit waiver the order placement must be prevented in the frontend.

fundRedemptionLimited.description: Flag indicating - if TRUE - that within prevalidation and before placement of a buy order a static note must be displayed indicating that the redemption of the fund is limited.

timestamp.description: Date and time with following format: 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss,SSSSSSX'

TimestampString.description: Represents the date with up to 6 fractions of seconds.

serviceCosts.description: Total cost entry for own service costs of bank (E)

serviceInducement.description: Total amount of inducements for own service costs of bank

externalCosts.description: Total cost entry for external service costs (F)

productCosts.description: Total cost entry for product costs (P)

TotalCostBlock.description: Model for a total cost block including total cost entries segregated as: E (own service costs of bank), F (external service costs), and P (product costs).

TotalCostEntry.description: Model for a total cost entry.

year1.description: Total holding cost entry for the first year

year2.description: Total holding cost entry for the second year

sales.description: Total holding cost entry for the year of the sale

TotalHoldingCostBlock.description: List of cost blocks over time.

type.description: Type of total holding cost entry

TotalHoldingCostEntry.description: Model for cost block over time.

visaCardImageId.description: Visa card image ID to be used in the application

imageBaseFilename.description: Base filename for the files representing the image. The name has to be extended with a postfix indicating the resolution and file type, e.g. -1x.jpg. The resulting filename can be used to retrieve the image from the comdirect CMS
